If you have a flight booked by April 30 and you cannot travel, don't worry. The amount you paid for your ticket will become personal credit for future travel up to December 31, 2020. Go to https://t.co/7I4nOM0CK5 https://t.co/JQdhJKh1JA

@lorenatp Hola Lore, entendemos lo que nos indicas, sin embargo, ten presente que podrás validar las opciones disponibles de protección a través del siguiente enlace: https://t.co/vYdfp6Fuu9. Quedamos atentos a tus comentarios. Saludos.

#AtentionPassengers: Due to the high demand of calls to our contact center, we are prioritizing passengers who fly in the next 48 hs. We appreciate your understanding. For measures regarding COVID-19 refer to https://t.co/4Cec80pzMc https://t.co/WgDFuYdc3n

data.text:
@guerreirovicky Hi Vicky, we apologize for the delay in our answer. We have been receiving large numbers of calls and messages. We have displayed the following options for our passengers, please check all the details here: 
https://t.co/DOwcvNCmv3. Regards.

@AnaCarolinaRop2 Olá, Ana Carolina. Devido grande demanda de contato, estamos enfrentando alguma demora para o atendimento. Lamentamos por isso. Você conseguiu realizar a viagem? Ainda precisa de ajuda?

If you have a flight booked by April 30 and you cannot travel, don't worry. The amount you paid for your ticket will become personal credit for future travel up to December 31, 2020. Go to https://t.co/7I4nOM0CK5 https://t.co/wbJN0F4l8T

#AtentionPassengers: Due to the high demand of calls to our contact center, we are prioritizing passengers who fly in the next 48 hs. We appreciate your understanding. For measures regarding COVID-19 refer to https://t.co/4Cec80pzMc https://t.co/TfXLzG52zC

data.text: @with_twist Hello, we apologize for the long time we took to reply, but due to the COVID-19 issue we have a high demand of requests; however, if you still need assistance, provide us the reservation code and full name of the passengers via DM. We'll be waiting for your reply. Kind regards.
